page.title: 03B.M.X.TRACK AT CRIEFF
page.content: Last night June 18th 1985 the Crieff B.M.X. Track was opened.The track was built by Perth and Kinross District council and designed by Clare Brodie's dad.The track consists of bumps and jumps called{whoops}and{tabletops. We have found out that 5% of Crieff Primary have B.M.X. bikes. The track was built to keep the children from doing stunts in dangerous places .The track was built in the disused coalyard . In about two years the council is going to build a freestyle arena,with ramps and quarter-pipes so that the children can do more daring stunts.
